summary: Adds in the island province of ninakin. coming Q3 2019!
descriptionHtml:
[u]Foreword:
[/u]On Tuesday 28th of March 2017 we started a massive project. It hopes to add in 9 custom Islands roughly the size of Solstheim. We are hoping to have it done within two years.

[u]We Have A Blog
[/u]We have a [url=https://ninakinisles.wordpress.com]wordpress blog[/url]! This is where we will update you on the mod and how it is developing. Follow it to get the latest Ninakin Isles facts

[u]What We Have Done[/u]
We have created a rough model of 2 islands. this is not rendered well enough even for the map but it's a start. Hopefully it will be here by Q3 2019.

[u]Members[/u]
There is a team of 4, with a possible addition of a 5th, their names on nexus (if they have it-if not steam names) are below
nexus users:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/36679050/?]Bluestripe[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/25469339/?]Ieltrun[/url]

Steam usernames:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/poodlecorpisdead]Ieltrun[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198124009789]Bluestripe
[/url][url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/captainchirps]Captain Chirpy[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198256606963]Anonyomouse
[/url][url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198171993933]Stranger Danger[/url]

If you want to get involved, visit our [url=https://ninakinisles.wordpress.com/contact/]contact subsection[/url] of our [url=https://ninakinisles.wordpress.com]mod site[/url], or join our [url=https://discord.gg/NFZbgUJ]group on discord[/url]!


Please don't steal our stuff.
author: Bluestripe-Ieltrun
